item.title: About Me
item.description: My Background I have about 8 years of experience in the Software Industry. Stuff I Work On I primarily work with the following: Programming Languages Java Javascript Basic to Intermediate Golang Scripting: Bash Automation Ansible DevOps CI/CD, Jenkins, TektonCD, Flux, ArgoCD, Helm Containers Use docker for almost every container runtime environment OpenShift and Kubernetes for Orchestrators Open Source Knowledge Sharing Thanks for reading!
